channel.title: Hugo on Charly3Pins Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Charly3Pins Blog

item.title: Build Hugo static blog
item.description: If you want to create a fast static website I recommend you Hugo. It’s written in Go and it’s really use to configure and adapt to your needs. In addition, you can choose through different themes created by the team and others by the community or even create your own one. Here I’ll explain in some steps how to create one blog with Hugo and how to be hosted & deployed in GitHub and GitHub Pages.
